q_en: How many orders are there in total under PolyU?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1;
steps.description: Count the total number of orders for the customer "PolyU"
